HEATING/AC NON-FUNCTIONING.  BLOWS ONLY COLD AIR.  JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE 2002. STARTED @ 75,000 MI WITH ONLY COLD AIR ON PASSENGER SIDE, 1 YEAR LATER ONLY COLD AIR BOTH SIDES.  JEEP DEALER WANTS $1200 TO REPLACE A "BLEND DOOR" BEHIND THE GLOVE COMPARTMENT.

WHEN HEAT IS ON, COLD AIR BLOWS FROM THE PASSENGER SIDE. I BELIEVE THE PASSENGER SIDE BLEND DOOR IS BROKEN. I BELIEVE THIS IS A FACTORY/DESIGN PROBLEM AND IT AFFECTS THE DEFOGGER AND VISIBILITY. ESTIMATES OVER $1,000 TO REPAIR.  *TR
